channel.title: Vanguard: Plain Talk on Investing™
channel.description: A series dedicated to helping you achieve financial success through practical, easy-to-follow steps. At Vanguard, we believe you can achieve your goals when you have the tools to do the job—and that’s what Plain Talk is all about.
channel.itunes:author: Vanguard
channel.author: Vanguard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Plain Talk on Investing™ is a podcast series from Vanguard
channel.itunes:summary: A series dedicated to helping you achieve financial success through practical, easy-to-follow steps. At Vanguard, we believe you can achieve your goals when you have the tools to do the job—and that’s what Plain Talk is all about.
channel.description: A series dedicated to helping you achieve financial success through practical, easy-to-follow steps. At Vanguard, we believe you can achieve your goals when you have the tools to do the job—and that’s what Plain Talk is all about.

item.title: Debt doesn't have to be a four-letter word
item.itunes:author: Vanguard
item.itunes:subtitle: A conversation with Vanguard's Ellen Rinaldi
item.itunes:summary: Debt is a fact of life, but it needn't become an overwhelming burden. In this interview, Vanguard's Ellen Rinaldi explains how to manage personal debt effectively. After you've heard the conversation, visit our Facebook page and tell us what you think.
item.description: Debt is a fact of life, but it needn't become an overwhelming burden. In this interview, Vanguard's Ellen Rinaldi explains how to manage personal debt effectively. After you've heard the conversation, visit our Facebook page and tell us what you think.

item.title: Is a single-fund investment right for you?
item.itunes:author: Vanguard
item.itunes:keywords: bruno, single fund options, retirement, target date funds,
item.itunes:subtitle: An episode from Vanguard’s Plain Talk on Investing™ podcast series
item.itunes:summary: Maria Bruno, a senior analyst with Vanguard Investment Counseling and Research, discusses single-fund options and how they can help you save for retirement.
item.description: Maria Bruno, a senior analyst with Vanguard Investment Counseling and Research, discusses single-fund options and how they can help you save for retirement.

item.title: What women need to know about retirement
item.itunes:author: Vanguard
item.itunes:subtitle: An episode from Vanguard’s Plain Talk on Investing™ podcast series
item.itunes:summary: Sarah Houston, a principal in Vanguard Retail Investor Group, discusses the reasons saving for retirement is so important, especially for women. She also explains that creating a well-balanced investment portfolio doesn't have to be complicated.
item.description: Sarah Houston, a principal in Vanguard Retail Investor Group, discusses the reasons saving for retirement is so important, especially for women. She also explains that creating a well-balanced investment portfolio doesn't have to be complicated.

item.title: What you need to know about long-term care
item.itunes:author: Vanguard
item.itunes:keywords: long term care insurance, health, healthcare, medicare, medicaid, rose d’alisa
item.itunes:subtitle: An episode from Vanguard’s Plain Talk on Investing™ podcast series
item.itunes:summary: Rose D'Alisa, a trust investment manager with Vanguard Asset Management Services, discusses the psychological and financial impact of long-term care. (8:45)
item.description: Rose D'Alisa, a trust investment manager with Vanguard Asset Management Services, discusses the psychological and financial impact of long-term care. (8:45)

item.title: Saving for college: Unique challenges require a unique approach
item.itunes:author: Vanguard
item.itunes:subtitle: An episode from our podcast series on saving for college
item.itunes:summary: Maria Bruno of Vanguard Investment Strategy and Tom O'Grady with Vanguard's Education Markets Group discuss ways to save for college while juggling other investing objectives. (10:15)
item.description: Maria Bruno of Vanguard Investment Strategy and Tom O'Grady with Vanguard's Education Markets Group discuss ways to save for college while juggling other investing objectives. (10:15)

item.title: Is an income annuity right for you?
item.itunes:author: Vanguard
item.itunes:subtitle: An episode from Vanguard’s Plain Talk on Investing™ podcast series
item.itunes:summary: Learn about the potential benefits (and drawbacks) of an income annuity, to help decide whether one is right for you. (7:00)
item.description: Learn about the potential benefits (and drawbacks) of an income annuity, to help decide whether one is right for you. (7:00)

item.title: Don't overlook your asset allocation as life changes
item.itunes:author: Vanguard
item.itunes:subtitle: An episode from Vanguard’s Plain Talk on Investing™ podcast series
item.itunes:summary: Vanguard principal Ellen Rinaldi describes how certain life events can represent opportunities to make sure that your investment portfolio is in line with your goals, risk tolerance, and time horizon. (8:53)
item.description: Vanguard principal Ellen Rinaldi describes how certain life events can represent opportunities to make sure that your investment portfolio is in line with your goals, risk tolerance, and time horizon. (8:53)

item.title: Mutual fund ratings: What you need to know

item.itunes:summary: Chris Philips, a senior analyst in Vanguard's Investment Strategy Group, takes a closer look at mutual fund ratings and explains why other factors should also be considered when choosing funds. (7:06)
